mapper.select: SELECT plan.ID, plan.date_day, plan.date_plan, plan.time_start, plan.time_end, charge.charge AS charge,purpose.purpose AS purpose, plan.status, charge.id AS chargeId,purpose.id AS purposeId, plan.status FROM plan JOIN charge ON plan.charge = charge.ID JOIN purpose ON plan.purpose = purpose.ID WHERE plan.id=#{id} ORDER BY plan.date_plan ASC;
